remarks: Move class substitution in and out of the converse of a function. Version of ~ csbcnv with a sethood antecedent but depending on fewer axioms.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Feb-2017.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement: csbcnvgALT $p |- ( A e. V -> `' [_ A / x ]_ F = [_ A / x ]_ `' F ) $.
